sentences.en: By August a dramatic reversal had occurred.
sentences.cn: 到了八月份,情况发生了显著的变化.

sentences.en: Industrial unrest and cheaper imports played their part in the company's reversal of fortunes.
sentences.cn: 工业动荡和比较低廉的进口使公司形势恶化.

sentences.en: Since the Administrator had relied on their assessments, the error was prejudicial and reversal was required.
sentences.cn: 鉴于行政长官依赖小组成员的评估分析, 错误即是有成见的,因此作出撤销的判决.

sentences.en: Some carers and dependants find it difficult to adapt to a role reversal .
sentences.cn: 有些照料者和被照料者觉得难以适应角色对换。

sentences.en: Some Internet firms have suffered a painful reversal of fortune (= they were successful but now they are not ) .
sentences.cn: 一些网络公司遭逢厄运。

sentences.en: Some people looking after elderly parents have trouble with the role reversal involved.
sentences.cn: 一些照看年迈父母的人在角色转变上有困难.

sentences.en: That would be a reversal of the order of host and guest.
That would be reversal of the order of host and guest.
The company suffered a great reversal of fortunes when public taste changed.
sentences.cn: 由于公众口味的改变,这个公司大倒其运.

sentences.en: The paper says the move represents a complete reversal of previous U.S. policy.
sentences.cn: 报上说这一举动反映了之前美国政策的彻底逆转。

sentences.en: The reversal of any entropychanging transformation would be neither reasonable nor possible.
sentences.cn: 熵的任何反向变化都是不合理的也是不可能的.

sentences.en: There developed , as a result, a reversal of the normal practice.
sentences.cn: 结果就产生与常态相反的做法.

sentences.en: This marked a 7% increase on the previous year and the reversal of a steady five-year downward trend.
sentences.cn: 这标志着在前一年基础上有了7％的增长，扭转了5年来持续下降的趋势。

sentences.en: This occurs especially during ring reversal.
sentences.cn: 这种情况尤其发生在活塞环倒向期间.

sentences.en: This will appear a strange reversal of the usual commentary.
sentences.cn: 这看起来好像故意跟一般评论唱离奇的反调.

sentences.en: What he had in mind amounted to nothing less than a total reversal of the traditional role of the executive.
sentences.cn: 他头脑中所想的简直就是对管理人员传统角色的彻底颠覆。

sentences.en: When children end up taking care of their parents, it is a strange role reversal indeed.
sentences.cn: 当孩子们最终要照顾父母时，这的确是一种奇妙的角色互换。

sentences.en: Your way of doing things at the moment seems to be a reversal of the order of host and guest.
sentences.cn: 你现在的作法似乎是喧宾夺主.
